mdRecord.dcterms:title: Petri dish
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Chicago Apparatus Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Two boxes, each containing a petri dish with cover. Label information: 4-220-025; Dish, Petri, Improved; O.I. 36086; Date Packed 1952-04; Chicago Apparatus Co., Chicago, Ill.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical laboratory equipment
